Text: The Wind in the Willows is a TV series that was originally broadcast between 1984 and 1987, based on characters from Kenneth Grahame's classic story "The Wind in the Willows" and following the 1983 film "The Wind in the Willows".

Text: The Wind in the Willows (TV series):  It was made by animation company Cosgrove Hall for Thames Television and shown on the ITV network.
